comments:
1.5 I200604272112 build

A NoClassDefFoundError keeps getting triggered when I try to work in the Snippets view.

Fedora Core 5 x86, gtk2-2.8.17-1.fc5.1, glibc-2.4-4, Sun JRE 1.4.2_10

Seems alright with JRE 1.5.0_6, though.
